Name: Ardent Sacrifice
Desc: Heals adjacent ally 10 HP. Unit loses 10HP (but cannot reach 0 this way)

Name: Dance
Desc: Makes the target unit active.

Name: Draw Back
Desc: Unit moves 1 space away from target ally, who moves to unit's former position.

Name: Harsh Command
Desc: Converts penalties on target into bonuses.

Name: Heal
Desc: Restores 5 HP.

Name: Martyr
Desc: Restores HP=7+this unit's suffered damage. Unit heals HP=half suffered damge. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1).

Name: Mend
Desc: Restores 10 HP.

Name: Physic
Desc: Restores 8 HP to target and all allies within 2 spaces of target.

Name: Pivot
Desc: Unit moves to opposite side of adjacent ally.

Name: Rally Attack
Desc: Grants Atk+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Name: Rally Defense
Desc: Grants Def+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Name: Rally Resistance
Desc: Grants Res+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Name: Rally Speed
Desc: Grants Spd +4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn

Name: Reciprocal Aid
Desc: Swap HP with adjacent ally (neither unit can go above their max HP).

Name: Reconcile
Desc: Restores 7 HP each to target and this unit.

Name: Recover
Desc: Restores 15 HP. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1)

Name: Rehabilitate
Desc: Restores 7 HP or more the further below 50% the target's HP is. Slows special trigger (cooldown count+1).

Name: Reposition
Desc: Moves adjacent ally to opposite side of unit.

Name: Shove
Desc: Push adjacent ally 1 space farther away.

Name: Sing
Desc: Enables target to take another action. Cannot be used on units with Sing or Dance

Name: Smite
Desc: Push adjacent ally 2 spaces farther away.

Name: Swap
Desc: Swap places with an adjacent ally.
